home.title: The Society
home.description1: We are a law firm where youth intertwines with maturity. We can thus combine the energy with which we embrace the matters entrusted to us, with the prudence and thoughtfulness with which we handle them.
home.description2: We distinguish ourselves by knowing how to give the client exactly what he needs at any given moment. Therefore, it can be said that we practice law tailored to the client.
home.description3: We address the matters entrusted to us with dedication and commitment, with a deep understanding of the subject matter across various fields of Law.
home.description4: We accept to sponsor matters of the most varied nature, in all areas of Law. We seek to fully satisfy the interests entrusted to us, with high ethical standards, quality, and efficiency. We hope to be of service to you.

what.serviceDescription: NGS provides sponsorship, advice, and legal consulting in various areas of law, integrating individual and collective clients, as well as other public entities.
what.businessLaw: In the area of business and corporate law, we handle incorporations, changes to company contracts, transfers of shares and quotas, exclusions and exemptions of partners, dissolutions, insolvencies and debt claims, restructurings, recoveries, and revitalizations (PER’s) of companies and, more recently, the drafting of investment projects and the submission of applications for funds under the Portugal 2020 framework.
what.humanRights: In the field of Human Rights, we can, among others, handle issues on the free movement and residence of European Union citizens in Portugal, Religious Freedom, acquisition and loss of Portuguese Nationality, Personal Data Protection, and Asylum Law.
what.laborLitigation: In labor litigation and pre-litigation, we accompany and instruct disciplinary processes and sponsor actions to challenge dismissals.
what.generalLitigation: In general litigation, we sponsor clients in actions of the most varied nature, regardless of the private or public nature of the interests discussed.
what.contracts: In the area of contracts, regardless of their type or nature, we prepare drafts and create conditions for their signing, regardless of the object and the position our client has in them.
what.feesDescription: In our Fee Notes, we seek to reflect the balance between the importance of the services we provide, the complexity of the matters we deal with, and the creativity placed in their resolution. As part of the fees, which will be finalized later, amounts may be requested in advance as provision or advances.
what.notarialServices: Regarding notarial services, these are provided under the provisions of Art. 38 of DL No. 76-A/2006, of 29 March, and Art. 27 of DL No. 26/2004, of 4 February, and are billed according to the Table of the Notarial and Registration Fees Regulation (DL No. 322-A/2001, of 14 December).
